info.title: Who Am I ?
info.desc: Creative full-stack web developer with {years}+ years of experience crafting front-end elegance and back-end power. I turn ideas into fast, functional, and user-friendly solutions — blending problem-solving with a designer’s eye and a thinker’s mind.

fun.text1: Promise I’m not hacking you… yet.
fun.text2: Totally normal human, not an alien.
fun.text3: This is definitely not a secret lair.
fun.text4: Ignore the suspiciously large number of cats.

skills.title: My Approach
skills.desc: During my learning journey, I didn’t just learn how to build something — I learned how everything works, why it works, and that mindset is what truly matters.
